channel.title: Releases on Hyperfoil
channel.description: Recent content in Releases on Hyperfoil

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: 0.26 (2024-05-31) Remove java.net.preferIPv4Stack=true Disable automatic report opening with –silent option Throw exception for misconfigured multi-host HTTP benchmark Add agent property to configure the ssh key used Set CPU Request in Benchmark s390x: Define utf-8 encoding in compiler plugin Dependecies upgrades, e.g., infinispan and vertx 0.25.2 (2023-08-03) Bug fix: Version command not working 0.25.1 (2023-08-02) Update dependencies 0.25 (2023-06-28) startWith: Delay feature Enhancements Bug fixes 0.24.2 (2023-05-02) Bug fix and enhancements 0.
